name: The Pinaka
description:
Theme :Reset theme

The Game is Under Development  so there may have bugs. i made this  in 2 Days..Game is not Completed due to lack of time . In future i will complete this project. There is no  enemy right now but without them,it is impossible to complete the Game..

Controls

A / Right Arrow   ->    Left.

D/ Left Arrow    ->  Right.

Space   ->    Jump.

S -> Roll/Spin

R - Reset/Rewind

W - Climb Ladder
